Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave./Elston
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave., Elston, Cortland, Ashland, and North Ave. due to, street blockage near North Ave./Elston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave., Elston, Cortland, Ashland, and North Ave. due to, street blockage near North Ave./Elston.

Allow extra travel time.
